title: azbit_official
author: azbit_official
content: Hello everyone!Azbit is looking for listing agents. Excellent conditions, payment on the same day.Please contact me regarding this.Telegram - @dan_azbitdan@azbit.comWaiting for your responses.Regards,Dan

comments.author: MuffinMaster
comments.created_time: November 13, 2022, 11:05:24 AMLast edit: November 13, 2022, 11:17:22 AM by MuffinMaster
comments.body: Nice that you're finally active on Bitcointalk after such a long absence here.For all those interested in this offer, I suggest you read the information contained in thread in links below.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5154000.0More details here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5154000.msg51655509#msg51655509and here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5154000.msg51658937#msg51658937Can you answer these scam accusations?or at least to that post in your ANN thread:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5114152.msg51818683#msg51818683
